landing.title: It's a brand new digital flyer experience
landing.subtitle: Find everything you need faster & easier than ever before
landing.canadaStore: The best value for your money

sidebar.title: Flyer List
sidebar.text: Click to view other flyers and publications

otherFlyers.title: Other Flyers
otherFlyers.text: Click to view other available flyers and other publications.

pdf.title: PDF
pdf.text: Click to download a copy of the flyer. Share the PDF or save for offline browsing.

zoom.title: Zoom
zoom.text: Zoom in for more detail and larger images, zoom out to view more great deals at once.

orientation.title: Scroll Orientation
orientation.text: Click once to change your scrolling mode to vertical view. Click again to return to horiztonal view.

fullscreen.title: Full Screen
fullscreen.text: Click to view the flyer within metro.ca and click again to view it in full screen mode.

searchFilter.title: Search and Filter
searchFilter.text: Use our new search and filter feature for easier browsing.

help.title: Help
help.text: Click to view more details on flyer features and navigation tools.

search.title: Search
search.text: Enter a keyword and easily search for the desired products you are looking for.

filterCategories.title: Filter By Category
filterCategories.text: Narrow down your discovery by selecting different categories.

discountFilter.title: Filter By Discount
discountFilter.text: Looking for a deal? Focus your search to your desired discount level.

clearDiscount.title: Clear
clearDiscount.text: Click to reset flyer search and/or clear any selected filters.

shoppingList.title: Shopping List
shoppingList.text: Click to see all the items that you have added into your list.

exitSearch.title: Exit
exitSearch.text: Click to close Search & Filter Features.

howto.navMob: Swipe Up and Down to browse pages and Pinch to Zoom-In and Out.
howto.click: Click to view other available flyers and other publications.
howto.flyerListSubtitle: Click to view other flyers and publications
howto.filter: Click to start the keyword search and/or filter by ways to save or category
howto.filterMob: Enter a keyword and easily search for the desired products you are looking for.
howto.filterSingleText: Click to filter by discount or category.
howto.download: Click to download a copy of the flyer. Share the PDF or save for offline browsing.
howto.symbols: Zoom in to increase size of offers or zoom out to decrease the size.
howto.horizontal: Click to choose your  preferred scrolling mode: horizontal or vertical.
howto.fullscreenText: Click to view full screen mode or click again to view the flyer within metro.ca.
howto.scroll: ‘Click & drag’ the page number to scroll through the flyer pages quickly.
howto.dragText: ‘Click & drag’ on the flyer pages to move through the flyer more accurately.
howto.info: Note: Clicking on a product allows you to view more details about that item.
howto.shoppingListText: Click to view your shopping list and modify, email or print for in-store shopping.
howto.detailsText: Clicking on a product allows you to view more details about that item.

disclaimer: In the event of disagreement between the flyer and this popup, the flyer shall take precedence.

shoppingList.addItemPlaceholder: Add an item to your list
shoppingList.noItemsInSLTitle: You currently have no items in your shopping list.
shoppingList.noItemsInSLMsg: Click on an item in the flyer to add it to your list or type it in below.
shoppingList.emailWarning: We will not use your email address for future promotions or communications
shoppingList.emailErrorMsg1: Something went wrong on our end.
shoppingList.emailSentMessage: Your shopping list has been sent.
shoppingList.emailSentMessage2: Please wait a few minutes before it arrives.
shoppingList.clearTitle: Are you sure you want to delete all of your shopping list items ?
shoppingList.clearDoneMessage: All items have been removed from your list
shoppingList.printDisclaimer: In the event of disagreement between the ad and this list, the ad shall take precedence.

search.noResultsMessage: We're sorry ! We couldn't find any search results for

noResults.title: Check for typos
noResults.message: Catching the smallest typo can make the biggest difference!

noResults.title: Limit keywords
noResults.message: For example, you'll get different results when you search for hamburger and beef

noResults.title: Use category filter
noResults.message: Clear your search and try the Category filter

noFlyersMsg: No flyers are available at the moment.

errors.noFlyersMsg: No flyers are available at the moment.
